message.name: ERR_SIMPAYMENT_INVALID_CASESTATUS
message.locale: Payment information is unavailable as the case status is %1c.

message.name: ERR_SIMPAYMENT_INVALID_DATE
message.locale: The payment due date entered is before the case start date %1d. Please enter a later date.

message.name: ERR_SIMPAYMENT_NO_PAYMENT_DUE
message.locale: No payments due on this date.

message.name: INF_SIMPAYMENT_DEDUCTION_NOT_MADE
message.locale: The %1c deduction could not be made.

message.name: INF_SIMPAYMENT_PAYMENT_PAID
message.locale: Payment has already been issued up to %1d. Please select a later date to simulate.
